item.title: [PI] Where can i put this code without getting errors?
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

here is where I am going to be putting my code: http://pastebin.com/RpkPswYx

this is the code I want to put into it: if (npcs[i].npcType == 559) { if (Misc.random2(50) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("You can't pass here!"); } }

Could anyone please tell me where I can insert this code w/o getting any errors?

Read full topic
